00137   void Clusteriser::init() {

00139     assert( _posError.size()==3 );
00140 
00141 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
00142     _histGroupKey=histmgr::Key_t(_histogramGroupName);
00143     histmgr::HistMgr *histogramList=histmgr::HistMgr::getInstance();
00144 
00145     _histCol[kH1NHits]=histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey,histmgr::Key_t("NHits"),2,
00146                                                        HistPar(50,-.5,50-.5));
00147     _histCol[kH1ClusterSignal]=histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey,histmgr::Key_t("ClusterSignal"),1,
00148                                                         HistPar(static_cast<UInt_t>(_signalHistPar[0]), _signalHistPar[1], _signalHistPar[2]));
00149     _histCol[kH1Mean]=histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey,histmgr::Key_t("ClusterBaryCentre"),3,
00150                                                         HistPar(static_cast<UInt_t>(_posHistPar[0]), _posHistPar[1], _posHistPar[2]));
00151     _histCol[kH1RMS]=histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey,histmgr::Key_t("ClusterRMS"),3,
00152                                                      HistPar(static_cast<UInt_t>(_posHistPar[0]), _posHistPar[1], _posHistPar[2]));

00160   void Clusteriser::processEvent( LCEvent * evtP ) {
00161     if (evtP) {
00162       try {
00163         LCCollection* col_hits = evtP->getCollection( _colName ) ;
00164         //      _isolatedHits.clear();
00165 
00166         std::vector<Box> cluster;
00167 
00168         // --- first step group nearby hits
00169         for(UInt_t element_i=0; element_i < (UInt_t) col_hits->getNumberOfElements(); element_i++) {
00170           EVENT::CalorimeterHit *a_hit=dynamic_cast<EVENT::CalorimeterHit *>(col_hits->getElementAt(element_i));
00171 
00172 #ifdef CAN_CAST_CALORIMETERHIT_GETPOSITION      
00173           const ThreeVector_t *pointP=reinterpret_cast<const ThreeVector_t *>(a_hit->getPosition());
00174 #else
00175           ThreeVector_t temp;
00176           temp.set(a_hit->getPosition());
00177           const ThreeVector_t *pointP=&temp;
00178 #endif
00179         
00180           Double_t min_distance=FLT_MAX;
00181           UInt_t min_cluster_index=cluster.size();
00182           UInt_t cluster_index=0;
00183           for(std::vector<Box>::const_iterator cluster_iter=cluster.begin(); cluster_iter!=cluster.end(); cluster_iter++, cluster_index++) {
00184             if (cluster_iter->closerToEnvelopThan(_maxDist,pointP)) {
00185               Double_t a_min_distance=cluster_iter->minDistanceToPoints(pointP);
00186               if (a_min_distance<_maxDist) {
00187                 if (a_min_distance<min_distance) {
00188                   min_cluster_index=cluster_index;
00189                 }
00190               }
00191             }
00192           }
00193 
00194           if (min_cluster_index<cluster.size()) {
00195             cluster[min_cluster_index].add(a_hit);
00196           }
00197           else {
00198             cluster.push_back(Box());
00199             cluster.back().add(a_hit);
00200           }
00201 
00202         }
00203 
00204         // --- second step merge nearby groups 
00205         std::vector<Box> merged_cluster;
00206         for(std::vector<Box>::iterator cluster_iter=cluster.begin(); cluster_iter!=cluster.end(); cluster_iter++) {
00207           std::vector<Box>::iterator iter=cluster_iter;
00208           iter++;
00209           for(; iter!=cluster.end(); iter++) {
00210             if (iter->closerToEnvelopThan(_maxDist,*cluster_iter)) {
00211               iter->add(*cluster_iter);
00212               cluster_iter->setMerged();
00213               break;
00214             }
00215           }
00216         }
00217 
00218         // --- third step split clusters
00219         // TODO
00220         
00221         // --- final step: create Cluster collection
00222         EVENT::LCCollection* col_cluster=new IMPL::LCCollectionVec( EVENT::LCIO::CLUSTER );
00223         UInt_t cluster_i=0;
00224         for(std::vector<Box>::const_iterator cluster_iter=cluster.begin(); cluster_iter!=cluster.end(); cluster_iter++,cluster_i++) {
00225           if (!cluster_iter->isMerged()) {
00226 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
00227             dynamic_cast<histmgr::FloatHistogram1D*>(_histCol[kH1NHits]->getElementAt(0))->fill(cluster_iter->_hits.size());
00228 #endif
00229             if (cluster_iter->_hits.size()>=static_cast<UInt_t>(_nHitsMin) ) {
00230               IMPL::ClusterImpl *a_cluster=new IMPL::ClusterImpl;
00231               Double_t sum[3]={0.,0.,0.};
00232               Double_t sum2[3]={0.,0.,0.};
00233               Double_t sum_of_weights=0.;
00234               Double_t total_energy=0.;
00235               
00236               for (std::vector<const EVENT::CalorimeterHit *>::const_iterator hit_iter=cluster_iter->_hits.begin();
00237                    hit_iter != cluster_iter->_hits.end();
00238                    hit_iter++) {
00239                 if ((*hit_iter)->getEnergy()>0.) {
00240                   total_energy+=(*hit_iter)->getEnergy();
00241                 }
00242               }
00243 
00244               for (std::vector<const EVENT::CalorimeterHit *>::const_iterator hit_iter=cluster_iter->_hits.begin();
00245                    hit_iter != cluster_iter->_hits.end();
00246                    hit_iter++) {
00247                 if ((*hit_iter)->getEnergy()>0.) {
00248                   Double_t energy=(*hit_iter)->getEnergy();
00249                   Double_t weight=_w0+std::log(energy/total_energy);
00250                   if (weight>0) {
00251                     for (UInt_t coord_i=0; coord_i<3; coord_i++) {
00252                       sum[coord_i]+=(*hit_iter)->getPosition()[coord_i] * weight;
00253                       sum2[coord_i]+= sqr((*hit_iter)->getPosition()[coord_i]) * weight;
00254                     }
00255                     sum_of_weights+=weight;
00256                   }
00257                   a_cluster->addHit(const_cast<EVENT::CalorimeterHit *>(*hit_iter),1.);
00258                 }
00259               }
00260 
00261 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
00262               dynamic_cast<histmgr::FloatHistogram1D*>(_histCol[kH1ClusterSignal]->getElementAt(0))->fill(total_energy);
00263 #endif
00264               if (total_energy>_minEnergy) {
00265                 Float_t pos[3];
00266                 EVENT::FloatVec pos_err;
00267                 pos_err.resize(6,0.);
00268                 if (sum_of_weights>0.) {
00269                   
00270                   for (UInt_t coord_i=0; coord_i<3; coord_i++) {
00271                     Double_t mean=sum[coord_i]/sum_of_weights;
00272                     sum2[coord_i]=sqrt((sum2[coord_i]-mean*sum[coord_i])/(sum_of_weights));
00273                     pos[coord_i]=mean;
00274 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
00275                     dynamic_cast<histmgr::FloatHistogram1D*>(_histCol[kH1Mean]->getElementAt(coord_i))->fill(mean);
00276                     dynamic_cast<histmgr::FloatHistogram1D*>(_histCol[kH1RMS]->getElementAt(coord_i))->fill(sum2[coord_i]);
00277 #endif
00278                   }
00279                 }
00280 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
00281                 dynamic_cast<histmgr::FloatHistogram1D*>(_histCol[kH1NHits]->getElementAt(0))->fill(cluster_iter->_hits.size());
00282 #endif
00283 
00284                 pos_err[1]=pos_err[2]=pos_err[4]=0.;
00285 //              pos_err[0]=sum2[0];
00286 //              pos_err[3]=sum2[1];
00287 //              pos_err[5]=sum2[2];
00288                 pos_err[0]=_posError[0];
00289                 pos_err[3]=_posError[1];
00290                 pos_err[5]=_posError[2];
00291                 a_cluster->setPosition(pos);
00292                 a_cluster->setPositionError(pos_err);
00293                 a_cluster->setEnergy(total_energy);
00294                 
00295                 // TODO: calculate cluster thrust axis.
00296                 
00297                 col_cluster->addElement(a_cluster);
00298               }
00299               else {
00300                 delete a_cluster;
00301               }
00302             }
00303           }
00304         }
00305         evtP->addCollection(col_cluster, _clusterColName);
00306         
00307       }
00308       catch (lcio::DataNotAvailableException err) {
00309       }
00310     }
00311   }
